name: chicagotribune
text: Chicago’s L&L Tavern is open again — at least on TV. The dive bar is featured on the new HBO series “Lovecraft Country,” which premieres this Sunday. https://t.co/kFjW3DgFN0

name: chicagotribune
text: “It felt normal, coming to say how we feel and being shut down,” one CPS student said after a group of protesters were turned away from Chicago Mayor Lori Lightfoot's block during a protest for police-free schools. https://t.co/9idZCTmrqk

name: chicagotribune
text:
“There’s no way we could pay for that, heading into the fall with no rent abatement. Throwing 80K at something and then having to close — that’s not a good plan.” 

A popular French restaurant in the West Loop is closing for good after nearly 22 years: https://t.co/VYLSy2VSXL
